com.lucidworks.apollo.component

Class ZooKeeperConfigurationComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lucidworks.apollo.component.ZooKeeperConfigurationComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ZooKeeperConfigurationComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Creates ZK-backed configuration objects, via Netflix Archaius and Apache Commons Configuration.

      • buildCompositeConfiguration

        public ConcurrentCompositeConfiguration buildCompositeConfiguration(CuratorFramework curatorFramework,
                                                                    ConcurrentCompositeConfiguration defaultConfig,
                                                                    int index)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Create one or more Zookeeper-backed ConfigurationSources and insert them into the provided CompositeConfiguration at the given index. This has side effects, since the ZookeeperConfigurationSource registers watchers w/ Zookeeper to watch for configuration changes. It also modifies the input argument (by inserting ZK configurations into it). Be ye warned.
        Parameters:
        curatorFramework - should be started
        defaultConfig - the config we should insert the new ZK configurations into
        index - the index where we should insert the ZK configurations
        Returns:
        the same ConcurrentCompositeConfiguration that was passed in.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteProperty

      • getProperty

        public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
        for testing. Getting things out of ZK should happen using Archaius, via ConfigurationComponent This assumes that the value is a String, since Archaius's ZookeeperConfigurationSource makes the same assumption.
        Parameters:
        key - the property to look up
        Returns:
        the value as a String, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if the value can't be converted to a String

        public int getZkConfigurationIndex()
